txt.en: Light of the Rising Dawn recovers Storm-lore on critical hit
Coordination:\nNext skill induction is reduced to 0 whenever your animal friend lands a critical hit.  Coordination will not trigger again for 10s after being used.
Heal-over-Time added to Beacon of Hope
Heal-over-Time added to Beacon of Hope
Beacon of Hope has a chance to add Water-Lore's Heal over Time effect to your target. In-combat only.
